titles: The famelie of loue Acted by the children of his Maiesties Reuells.
author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
publisher: Printed [by Richard Bradock] for Iohn Helmes, and are to be sold in Saint Dunstans Churchyard in Fleetstreet,
notes: Running title reads: The family of loue.
A variant of the edition with "familie" in the title.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Familists --  England --  Drama --  Early works to 1800.
